translations: 特有的风格（idiosyncrasy 的名词复数）
（对药物、食物等的）[医]特异反应，过敏
气质，习性，癖好（idiosyncrasy 的名词复数）

sentences.sentence: Everyone has a few little idiosyncrasies.
The car has its little idiosyncrasies.
sentences.translation: 这辆车有它的一些小小脾气。

sentences.sentence: Each market has its own idiosyncrasies.
sentences.translation: 每个市场都有自己的特质。
